metadata.title: CVE-2020-13092 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** scikit-learn (aka sklearn) through 0.23.0 can unserializeand execute commands from an untrusted file that is passed to thejoblib.load() function, if __reduce__ makes an os.system call. NOTE: thirdparties dispute this issue because the joblib.load() function is documentedas unsafe and it is the user's responsibility to use the function in asecure manner.

criterions.comment: scikit-learn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
